remarks: Value of the direct product projection (defined in terms of binary projection).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2016.)
statement:
dpjfval.1 $e |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) $.
dpjfval.2 $e |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) $.
dpjfval.p $e |- P = ( G dProj S ) $.
dpjfval.q $e |- Q = ( proj1 ` G ) $.
dpjfval $p |- ( ph -> P = ( i e. I |-> ( ( S ` i ) Q ( G DProd ( S |` ( I \ { i } ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d G i $.
$d I i $.
$d S i $.
$d i ph $.
